100x1=100									1415x1=1415
100x2=200									1415x2=2830
100x3=300									1415x3=4245
100x4=400									1415x4=5660
100x5=500									1415x5=7075
100x6=600									1415x6=8490
100x7=700									1415x7=9905
100x8=800									1415x8=11320
100x9=900									1415x9=12735
100x10=1000						1415x10=14150
